abstract: JPMorgan Chase is suing Javier Martin-Artajo, the manager who directly supervised Bruno Iksil, the so-called London Whale whose outsize positions prompted the bank’s multibillion-dollar trading loss.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase is suing Javier Martin-Artajo, the manager who directly supervised Bruno Iksil, the so-called London Whale whose outsize positions prompted the bank’s multibillion-dollar trading loss.
lead_paragraph: The fallout continues from a multibillion-dollar trading loss at JPMorgan Chase.

headline.main: JPMorgan Sues Boss of ‘London Whale’ in Trading Loss
headline.print_headline: JPMorgan Sues Boss of ‘London Whale’ in Trading Loss
